The list of Hawaii coastal plant species and status of coastal sand-dune plants scored based on ESA status. Species lists and classification comes from (Merlin, 1999)Merlin 1999. ESA data comes from the US Fish and Wildlife Service ECOS Environmental Conservation Online System (https://ecos.fws.gov/ecp/).
